title: Cum For The Viking 2
description: During an invasion by aggressive Norsemen, Lady Charlotte Abbot and her sister, Emma, find themselves at the mercy of Finn Vapnfjord and a lusty contingent of Vikings. As their village is sacked, they are seduced into sexual slavery, satisfying the needs of the men, while their virgin flesh is blissfully ravaged.This story contains forced seduction, virgin sex, oral sex, double penetration, anal sex, an orgy, and scenes of Viking debauchery. All characters are eighteen and above. Adult 18+
author: Virginia Wade
